breakfast.descriptionKey: Hot buttered English muffins, Canadian-style bacon, and poached eggs are topped with a heavenly drizzle of hollandaise sauce.

breakfast.title: Blueberry Oat Squares
breakfast.description: Our version of these delicious bars is not only mouth watering, but it will keep you coming for more!

breakfast.title: Fresh Start Sampller
breakfast.description: Start your day with a mix of low fat vanilla yogurt, fresh seasonal fruit topped with our honey oat granola mix with almonds and dried fruit, two eggs* cooked to order.

breakfast.title: Double Meat Breakfast
breakfast.description: Three eggs cooked to order with a full order of bacon and sausage patties. Served with Grits, Sawmill Gravy, homemade Buttermilk Biscuits and real butter.

lunch.title: Beef Lasagne
lunch.description: Rich beef ragu and creamy bechamel sauce layered between pasta sheets, with Neapolitan sauce.

lunch.title: Buttermilk Flapjacks
lunch.description: Two flapjacks served with molasses and our signature sassafras-infused whipped cream.

lunch.title: Braised Stuffed Morel
lunch.description: Welcome to the rich taste of a smoked duck, foie gras, asparagus and black garlic in style.

lunch.title: Strawberry Custard Tart
lunch.description: This incredible desert consists of elderflower, mascarpone sorbet and sweet cicely.

dinner.title: Buttermilk Pancakes
dinner.description: Three pancakes with your choice of one of our warm fruit toppings. All topped with real whipped cream. Enjoy apple, blackberry or peach.

dinner.title: Lemonade Parfait
dinner.description: A beautiful combination of honey, bergamot, sheep's milk yoghurt and something special.

dinner.title: Pork Roulet With Spanach
dinner.description: This fine meal is made from pork, spanach, mini pumkins and fresh potatoes.

dinner.title: "Eggplant â€œMignon" Plus
dinner.description: Large herb-infused eggplant steak, ratatouille, roasted tomato and mint pesto.
